thread.title: Kizzang Sweepstakes and Princess Cruises offer Free Cruise Prizes in Kizzang Mobile Game
thread.title_full: Kizzang Sweepstakes and Princess Cruises offer Free Cruise Prizes in Kizzang Mobile Game

author: admin
title: Kizzang Sweepstakes and Princess Cruises offer Free Cruise Prizes in Kizzang Mobile Game
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/23/2015 @ 12:58 PM   Kizzang 
LAS VEGAS, Sept. 23, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Kizzang Sweepstakes and Princess Cruises have partnered to offer a series of prizes to be won by playing Kizzang's mobile and online games. The prizes include: seven-day Eastern Caribbean cruises to be won in Kizzang's Fat Cat Sweepstakes, and five-day Eastern Caribbean Getaway cruises to be awarded to the grand prize winners of Kizzang's exclusive Princess Cruises scratch card game. 
https://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150923/269951LOGO 
Curtis Crystal of Rancho Santa Margarita, California, is the winner of Kizzang's first Fat Cat Sweepstakes Princess Cruises prize. Mr. Crystal and his wife will be enjoying a balcony room on a seven-day Eastern Caribbean Cruise. All of the lucky winners of Kizzang Sweepstakes' cruise prizes will enjoy nightly entertainment, 24-hour room service, Anytime Dining, and onboard casual dining venues. 
Kizzang is available on iOS and Android devices, Facebook, and at kizzangsweepstakes.com. The game is free to download, and there are no in-app purchases. Players may enter daily slot tournaments, play sports contests, or choose from a variety of scratch cards, including the new Princess Cruises scratch card. The Princess Cruises scratch card will be available until all cards have been played, or until November 3, whichever comes first. 
"Winning a Princess Cruise will be a dream come true for Kizzang's lucky winners," said Robert Alexander, president and founder of Kizzang. "Our Princess Cruises prizes are an exciting complement to Kizzang's rewarding games where players pay nothing, and play for the chance to win real cash and prizes daily. With Kizzang, you can't lose - you can only win!" 
* Players must be at least 21 years old to play. Princess Cruises and its affiliates are independently owned and operated. 
About Kizzang 
Based in Las Vegas, NV, Kizzang LLC is the leading provider of personal themed entertainment. Founded in 2013 by a group of video game veterans, Kizzang's games will always be free. The company's mission is to offer the greatest player experience, give away the best prizes and award the largest cash jackpots. Visit kizzang.com for more information.
